title: Topic 004 Question 041
body: You have a connected Azure Stack Hub integrated system.
•	Ona server named SERVER1, you create a file share named AzSHLogs.
•	You create a PowerShell remoting session to the privileged endpoint (PEP) of the inte-grated system.
•	In a variable named $Session, you store a reference to the session.
•	In a variable named $AdminCredentials, you store a reference to the credentials required to write to AzSHLogs.
You need to collect the Hyper-V event logs for all the cluster hosts and copy the logs to the AzSHLogs share.
How should you complete the PowerShell script? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
